channel.title: Bank Emote Button
channel.description: Hi, im using a pimpscape source and in the "yes" emotes place there is bank but it doesnt work and because of that non-admin players cannot use ::bank so how can i change that emote thing and allow every1 use ::bank?

item.title: Bank Emote Button
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

You could just have else if (command.startsWith("bank")) { openUpBank(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Emote Button
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The bank command didnt work for me at first, Go into your custom commands.
And add this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { sendQuest(" @cya@The Bank of @whi@Your Server", 5383); sendFrame248(5292, 5063); resetItems(5064); IsBanking = true; }
Then compile and stuff. It worked for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Emote Button
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“csrsniper254, post:10, topic:52120”]Might as well make a new command.

Add this with your other voids:

} public void openUpBank() { sendQuest(" ~Welcome to the bank of eh pretty easy~", 5383); sendFrame248(5292, 5063); resetItems(5064); IsBanking = true; }

Now search for your commands Ex: “saveme” under the last } add this:

else if (command.startsWith("bank")) if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); } else { openUpBank(); }

This restricts the ability to open bank in the wild. To make it open anywhere remove:

else if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); }[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 07:04:29 PM[/size][hr]Or in your case just remove the else before if…[/quote]
tried that, put all things right but then i got 100 errors lol

Read full topic

item.title: Bank Emote Button
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Might as well make a new command.

Add this with your other voids:

} public void openUpBank() { sendQuest(" ~Welcome to the bank of eh pretty easy~", 5383); sendFrame248(5292, 5063); resetItems(5064); IsBanking = true; }

Now search for your commands Ex: “saveme” under the last } add this:

else if (command.startsWith("bank")) if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); } else { openUpBank(); }

This restricts the ability to open bank in the wild. To make it open anywhere remove:

else if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) { sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); }[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 07:04:29 PM[/size][hr]Or in your case just remove the else before if…

Read full topic
